exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros u l. split. - intros H eps. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. + intros N. specialize (H1 N). destruct H1 as [n [Hle Hlt]]. exists (S n). split. * lia. * apply Hlt. + destruct (ex_LimInf_seq u l) as [l' Hl']. exists l'. intros n. specialize (H2 n). lia. - intros H eps. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. + intros N. specialize (H1 N). destruct H1 as [n [Hle Hlt]]. exists n. split. * lia. * apply Hlt. + destruct (ex_LimInf_seq u l) as [l' Hl']. exists l'. intros n. specialize (H2 n). lia.
